story-context.acceptanceCriteria:
**Given** the site needs terms of service (legal protection) **When** a user navigates to /terms or clicks Terms of Service link **Then** a comprehensive ToS page is displayed with all required sections **And** automated tests exist covering main functionality
### 8 Required Sections 1. Acceptance of Terms 2. Service Description (community prediction tracking, as-is, no warranties) 3. User Conduct (no spam/bots/manipulation, right to remove predictions) 4. Intellectual Property (© 2025 GTA6Predictions, user predictions ownership, GTA 6 trademarks fair use) 5. Liability Limitations (entertainment purposes, no liability for inaccuracy/data loss, max $0) 6. Dispute Resolution (governing law, informal resolution, arbitration, class action waiver) 7. Modifications (update rights, notice, continued use = acceptance) 8. Termination (right to terminate, user data deletion rights)
### Page Formatting - Numbered sections for easy reference - Last updated date displayed - Link from footer on every page - Not required to accept before use (browse freely) - Mobile-responsive design
### Testing Requirements - Unit tests for terms page route - Test page accessibility (WCAG AA) - Test numbered section structure - Test mobile responsiveness - Test footer link presence
